text:
Hi eveyyone! We recently started with Google and Facebooks ads and we would like to have all the data centralized in HubSpot. That was actually the reason why we use this service. While on the "Ads" tab I can see impressions and clicks, I dont see contacts while a get a contact error. Do you know what might be wrong? I have connected the Google app to HubSpot.
But the question might endup to be, how to we attribute contacts coming from paid ads to the each network..
